title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register and receive a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to user registration screen
Input valid new user data (username, email, password, etc.)
Submit registration form
Check HTTP 201 response with valid JWT token returned
Verify user is redirected to wine library with session initialized

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that an existing user can login successfully with correct credentials and receive a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid registered username/email and password
Click login button
Check HTTP 200 response with valid JWT token
Verify user profile data is fetched and session initialized

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login failure when user provides invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input incorrect username/email or password
Attempt to login
Check HTTP 401 or appropriate error response
Verify that no JWT token is issued and error message is shown

title: Two-Step Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that a user can request a password reset code and successfully reset their password using a two-step process.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery request screen
Input registered email or username
Submit password reset code request
Verify reset code is issued and communicated (e.g., email simulated)
Navigate to password reset screen
Input received reset code and a new valid password
Submit password reset
Verify HTTP 200 response and password is updated
Confirm user can login with new password

title: Password Recovery with Invalid Reset Code
description: Ensure password reset fails when an invalid or expired reset code is submitted.

steps.description: Request password reset code for a user
Attempt to reset password using invalid or expired reset code
Verify HTTP error response and appropriate error message
Confirm password has not been updated

title: Create Wine Entry with OCR Image Upload
description: Verify that a user can create a new wine entry including uploading an image and using OCR to extract label data.

steps.description: Navigate to create wine entry form
Fill in wine data fields with valid inputs
Upload base64-encoded wine label image (less than 5MB)
Trigger OCR process to extract text from label
Check OCR returns extracted text or HTTP 503 if inactive
Submit wine creation form
Verify HTTP 201 response and new wine appears in user's library

title: Fail Wine Image Upload for Exceeding Size Limit
description: Verify that uploading an image larger than 5 MB fails gracefully with an error.

steps.description: Attempt to upload base64 image exceeding 5 MB during wine creation or edit
Check for HTTP error status and meaningful error message
Validate that wine entry is not created or updated with invalid upload

title: Read Wine Library Listing
description: Verify that the wine library lists all wines properly with country flags, grape details, and favorite toggle states.

steps.description: Navigate to wine library page
Verify list displays userâ€™s wine entries with correct data
Check each wine card shows country flags and grape variety details
Toggle favorite state for some wines
Verify favorite toggle updates visually and persists state

title: Update Wine Entry and Replace Harmonizations
description: Confirm that editing an existing wine entry updates all information including replacing harmonizations correctly.

steps.description: Select an existing wine entry from library
Navigate to edit form and modify fields including harmonizations
Submit updates
Verify HTTP 200 response for update
Check updated harmonizations are replaced and displayed in wine details

title: Delete Wine Entry
description: Verify that a user can delete a wine entry and it is removed from their library.

steps.description: Select a wine entry from the library
Trigger the delete action and confirm the deletion
Verify HTTP 200 or 204 response upon deletion
Confirm the entry no longer appears in the wine library

title: View Wine Detail with Harmonizations and Facts
description: Ensure that selecting a wine shows its detailed information including harmonizations and key facts without grape details.

steps.description: Click a wine card from the library listing
Verify detailed view loads with harmonization information
Confirm wine facts such as winery, region, alcohol content, and description are visible
Check that grape details are not shown in this detailed view

title: Configure Taste Profile and Persist Data
description: Verify users can update their taste profile (intensity, style, sweetness, moments, personality) and the data is persisted via API.

steps.description: Navigate to taste profile configuration screen
Modify various taste preference fields
Submit the updated taste profile
Verify HTTP 200 response on profile update
Reload profile and confirm saved data matches input

title: Receive Personalized Wine Recommendations Based on Taste Profile
description: Ensure the recommendations API returns a list of wines tailored to the user's taste profile when one is configured.

steps.description: User has a configured taste profile saved
Request personalized wine recommendations
Verify HTTP 200 response with a list of recommended wines
Ensure recommendations reflect user preferences logically

title: Update Profile and Account Settings
description: Verify that users can update their profile preferences including country, language, theme, and marketing options with immediate effect.

steps.description: Navigate to profile and account settings screens
Change country, language, theme, and toggle marketing preferences
Submit settings update
Verify HTTP 200 response
Verify UI updates reflect new preferences immediately

title: Account Deletion Removes User Data and Invalidates Session
description: Verify that account deletion removes all user data and invalidates the current session preventing further access.

steps.description: Navigate to account deletion option in settings
Confirm account deletion
Check HTTP 200 response confirming deletion
Attempt to access protected resources with previous token
Verify access is denied and token is invalidated

title: User Level Endpoint Accuracy
description: Verify that the user level endpoint returns the correct level based on simulated user engagement badges like Beginner, Curious, Sommelier, and Expert.

steps.description: Simulate user activity to reach different badge levels
Request user level from endpoint
Verify the returned user level matches expected badge for the simulated activity

title: Privacy Policy Endpoint Returns Legal Text
description: Validate that the privacy policy endpoint returns full legal text as expected.

steps.description: Send GET request to privacy policy endpoint
Verify response includes complete legal text content

title: Health Endpoint Indicates Service Status
description: Verify that health check endpoint correctly indicates service operational status.

steps.description: Send request to health endpoint
Confirm service status is reported as up and running

title: API Standardized Error Handling
description: Verify that API consistently returns meaningful error codes and messages for invalid or malformed requests.

steps.description: Make API requests with invalid data, missing headers, or unauthorized access
Verify appropriate HTTP status codes (400, 401, 403, 404, 503) and descriptive error messages are returned

title: JWT Based Route Protection
description: Verify that protected API routes require a valid JWT token and reject unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected API routes without token
Verify HTTP 401 Unauthorized response
Attempt access with invalid or expired tokens
Verify HTTP 401 Unauthorized response
Access protected routes with valid JWT token
Verify access granted and responses are successful

title: Responsive UI Compatibility on Multiple Devices
description: Verify that the SPA UI renders and functions correctly on modern browsers and various mobile devices.

steps.description: Open the application in latest Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge on desktop
Verify UI layout is correct and all interactive components work
Open the application on mobile devices with different screen sizes
Verify responsive design works, menus and forms are usable, no content overflow

title: Performance: Wine Listing Response Time
description: Verify that wine listings load and respond within 500 ms to meet performance targets.

steps.description: Request wine library listing
Measure API and UI response time
Ensure response time is under 500 ms

title: Performance: Error Rates Under Threshold
description: Verify that the application maintains error rates within acceptable thresholds during typical use.

steps.description: Simulate standard user operations across features repeatedly
Monitor system error response rate
Confirm error rate remains below defined thresholds
